text: This app needs the sweeping feature added asap. This is a game changer I just can believe that more email service providers aren’t using a similar functionality.

title: Ads
text: Great product except for ads, I ran this app along with my mail app and noticed an increase in “directed ad e-mail's” coming at me from Microsoft with no way to turn them off or unsubscribe.  I could only hide them which created more ads from other companies.

title: Much better than built in mail app for iPhone
text:
The basic built in mail app for iPhone is fine, but does not have many features. This mobile app for Outlook has many more of the full desktop mail features. 
Personally I find outlook to be much more logical and user friendly than gmail. I’m not a gmail fan in general.

title: My review
text: I think this app is very useful or schools because sometimes having online homework is easier and this is a way you can email it it’s also good for students to email each other like if you were doing a school assignment together you could use outlook to email each other ideas and drafts

title: Positive experience with a bit more upside
text:
Over two years ago made the transition from iOS email to Outlook. 
Overall a very positive experience. 
Things to improve on: 
1. Email Search function - cumbersome, incomplete and inefficient 
2. Email Attachments - search, view and save
3. Calendar - zoom function unreliable compared to Teams

title: I like this app for Outlook or Live Emails!
text: This app is just like being on a desktop or a laptop computer, with current updates and real time! And, it is easy to email with this app send, with this app you could also speak into the phone and the email will automatically type the email making it easier to use! Try it, you will not regret it!

Then try something else and if doesn’t work then try this…. Just sends you down a endless hole. IF it works give it a day or two.. then…. Oh well, support cannot help. They don’t care. Or they don’t know what is wrong either and can’t even answer simple questions. They come back with a question, not related to problem when unable to answer

title: Searching capabilities

title: Nothing works like web or desktop
text:
Not sure how this app has a 4.8 rating, but here is my review. 

This app is never fixed. 
1. Sub folders under inbox do not sync to what is on O365 online. This makes it problematic looking for emails. 
2. The calendar does not update in realtime. It can take more than 24 hours to show correct data. This goes for outside calendars as well that are synced. 
3. There should be similar functionality as of the web and desktop version. 

Hopefully this is fixed soon. I hate uninstalling and reinstalling the app just to fix it. I’ve never seen a fix for this app. All updates always say bug fixes, but nothing has been fixed.

title: Love
text: Love

title: Works ok but needs some work
text: The biggest thing is, right now I’m on vacation and I’m writing this review because even though I have automatic replies turned on it’s still sending me notifications. Why? Why would I possibly want that? Why would anyone want that? Please. I am begging you. Think. Think about what people want.

title: I Wish…
text: I wish your email signature from the desktop app could be the same as here. And that the email threads would start with the most recent email, like they do in the desktop app.

title: The best

title: Only one request
